name: Man O'Wind
description:
Made for GMTK gamejam 2020!

You are lost on a deserted island...Use P to pick up items and the numbers to use/drop them. But beware! The climate is your enemy! Your only choice to survive is...surviving. i guess that you are really out of control. 

The game is mainly unfinished, but show it some love and we may consider to continue it!
